# Get Folder Items

# Description

Lists items contained in a parent folder in Box.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Folder - Select the folder to retrieve lit of items within it. Click the icon to browse your Box folders. This field supports String type input.
* Content to return - Content type. Select one of the available options from the drop-down list: Files and Folders (default value), Files, Folders.









* Response object - Automatically generated output variable.
